skillTree.localised_description: A warrior's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
Rare and majestic, Jade Longma only allow themselves to be ridden by the truly worthy.
The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Those who have no spine, no courage, suffer the most under Xian Feng's besmirching gaze.

target_if: Leadership is lower than 50% of base
Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Xian Feng has never met a warrior he is sure he cannot quash, for his ego is second only to his ability.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Peasants who dare to step in the path of the great Xian Feng are swatted aside like vermin by his fiery rage.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: As the battle grows longer and the weak crumble and collapse, Xian Feng grows ever more alive.
Pride and ego make Xian Feng put in many hours in the practice ring, his weapons flashing as they dispatch foe after foe with brutal efficiency.
For all of Xian Feng's ego, he is, when called upon, an exquisite exemplar of the purity of Yang.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: As one of the mightiest warriors of Grand Cathay, Xian Feng has proven himself to be an expert combatant, as well as an imposing presence on the battlefield. Unfortunately for those who believe in the purity of Yang, Xian is also corrupted, riven by greed and envy and ego.

effects.description: Income from sacking and looting settlements: +50%
